review: I only really need this device for the plex app integration and frankly its horrible. The poor streaming quality is a deal breaker. It may be plex's fault, but I have no issues with plex anywhere else except for the fire stick. The fire stick itself also locks up all the time and I have to constantly unplug it.
author: mr blah

review: I received the Fire Stick sooner than Amazon stated it would arrive which was a plus . I have to say that I'm new to streaming movies on the internet. The Fire Stick was very easy to set up and navigate.  The Fire Stick has so much to choose from; from movies to TV series to you tube videos, and numerous other apps.  Absolutely love it!!!
author: Stefan Cervik

review: I am electronically challenged and I was able to set it up and begin using it without any problems.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love my Kindle Fire Stick. I have Kindle Prime so I have movies, TV shows, music, and my photos stored in the Amazon Cloud at my finger tips and all on my big screen HD TV.
author: Youngatheart

review: It works well, and a much cheaper alternative to buying a smart TV for my bedroom. I've had a few problems with it finding my internet connection, but I leave it plugged into my wall, so if I disconnect it to reset, it works just fine after. I use it for Netflix and Amazon Prime Videos.
author: Dinorah

review: Really awesome. I wish it had one for the living room since I am disabled but I can afford it. Really awesome product!
author: GINGER K STEWARD

review: The Fire Stick was easy to install and allows for a very large selection of viewing especially if you are a Amazon Prime Customer.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Dumped my cable, love this, lots of apps, easy to use, I think it's better than apple tv.  Tried google's and couldn't even get it to work.  This is great, I have one for each of my tv's.
author: consumer

review: The commercials on TV make the Fire Stick look so easy to plug in and use. They don't show that the stick had to be plugged into an outlet or another USB port
